title: Application of Machine Learning and Deep Learning Models for Sarcasm Detection

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Consideration of Smartphone-Based Learning Environments, Utilizing Cloud Environments Such as Google Colab for Practical Use

learning_goals: Ability to explain linguistic characteristics of satire and computational analysis complexity
Ability to apply machine learning models (logistic regression, SVM) using preprocessed social media datasets
Ability to compare satire detection performance using BERT and BiLSTM-based deep learning models and propose improvement strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
